info.description: A Storage Cache provides scalable caching service for NAS clients, serving data from either NFSv3 or Blob at-rest storage (referred to as "Storage Targets"). These operations allow you to manage Caches.
info.title: Storage Cache Mgmt Client

200.description: The list of available Resource Provider operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available Resource Provider operations.

200.description: A list of SKU descriptors.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the list of StorageCache.Cache SKUs available to this subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: All cached data has been flushed to the Storage Target(s).

202.description: Cache has started flushing to its Storage Target(s). Poll the Cache's state field to monitor.

204.description: Cache flush already in progress or has completed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Tells a Cache to write all dirty data to the Storage Target(s). During the flush, clients will see errors returned until the flush is complete.

parameters.description: Target resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: Name of Cache. Length of name must be not greater than 80 and chars must be in list of [-0-9a-zA-Z_] char class.
parameters.name: cacheName

200.description: Cache is Active.

202.description: Cache has started the transition to Active. Poll the Cache's state field to monitor.

204.description: Restarted VMs associated with the cache.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Tells a Stopped state Cache to transition to Active state.

parameters.description: Target resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: Name of Cache. Length of name must be not greater than 80 and chars must be in list of [-0-9a-zA-Z_] char class.
parameters.name: cacheName

200.description: Cache is stopped.

202.description: Cache has started the transition to Stopped. Poll the Cache's state field to monitor.

204.description: Stopped VMs associated with the cache.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Tells an Active Cache to transition to Stopped state.

get.description: Returns a list of Storage Targets for the specified Cache.

parameters.description: Target resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: Name of Cache. Length of name must be not greater than 80 and chars must be in list of [-0-9a-zA-Z_] char class.
parameters.name: cacheName

parameters.description: Name of Storage Target.
parameters.name: storageTargetName

200.description: Storage target deleted.

202.description: Started the Storage Target's deletion. Poll the Cache's Storage Targets to monitor.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Removes a Storage Target from a Cache. This operation is allowed at any time, but if the Cache is down or unhealthy, the actual removal of the Storage Target may be delayed until the Cache is healthy again. Note that if the Cache has data to flush to the Storage Target, the data will be flushed before the Storage Target will be deleted.

parameters.description: Target resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: Name of Cache. Length of name must be not greater than 80 and chars must be in list of [-0-9a-zA-Z_] char class.
parameters.name: cacheName

parameters.description: Name of the Storage Target. Length of name must be not greater than 80 and chars must be in list of [-0-9a-zA-Z_] char class.
parameters.name: storageTargetName

200.description: Returns the Storage Target object corresponding to storageTargetName.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns a Storage Target from a Cache.

parameters.description: Target resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: Name of Cache. Length of name must be not greater than 80 and chars must be in list of [-0-9a-zA-Z_] char class.
parameters.name: cacheName

parameters.description: Name of the Storage Target. Length of name must be not greater than 80 and chars must be in list of [-0-9a-zA-Z_] char class.
parameters.name: storageTargetName

parameters.description: Object containing the definition of a Storage Target.
parameters.name: storagetarget

200.description: Storage Target has been created or updated.

201.description: Storage Target creation or update has been initiated. Poll the new Storage Target's provisioningState property to monitor creation progress.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create or update a Storage Target. This operation is allowed at any time, but if the Cache is down or unhealthy, the actual creation/modification of the Storage Target may be delayed until the Cache is healthy again.

parameters.description: Target resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: Name of Cache. Length of name must be not greater than 80 and chars must be in list of [-0-9a-zA-Z_] char class.
parameters.name: cacheName

201.description: Cache firmware is up to date.

202.description: Cache has started the upgrade. Poll the Cache's state field to monitor.

204.description: Cache firmware is up to date.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Upgrade a Cache's firmware if a new version is available. Otherwise, this operation has no effect.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName

info
parameters.description: Information about the archive operation

202.description: amlFilesystem has started the archive. Poll the amlFilesystem's archive state field to monitor.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Cache, amlFilesystem, etc.

ApiOperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Resource Provider operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of Resource Provider operations supported by the Microsoft.StorageCache resource provider.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

startTime.description: The start time of the operation.

endTime.description: The end time of the operation.

error.description: The error detail of the operation if any.

ErrorResponse.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

Cache.description: A Cache instance. Follows Azure Resource Manager standards: https://github.com/Azure/azure-resource-manager-rpc/blob/master/v1.0/resource-api-reference.md

identity.description: The identity of the cache, if configured.

cacheSizeGB.description: The size of this Cache, in GB.

mountAddresses.description: Array of IP addresses that can be used by clients mounting this Cache.

networkSettings.description: Specifies network settings of the cache.

encryptionSettings.description: Specifies encryption settings of the cache.

securitySettings.description: Specifies security settings of the cache.

principalId.description: The principal id of the cache.

tenantId.description: The tenant id associated with the cache.

type.description: The type of identity used for the cache

mtu.description: The IPv4 maximum transmission unit configured for the subnet.

utilityAddresses.description: Array of additional IP addresses used by this Cache.

keyEncryptionKey.description: Specifies the location of the key encryption key in Key Vault.

KeyVaultKeyReference.description: Describes a reference to Key Vault Key.

keyUrl.description: The URL referencing a key encryption key in Key Vault.

sourceVault.description: Describes a resource Id to source Key Vault.

CachesListResult.description: Result of the request to list Caches. It contains a list of Caches and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of Cache list results, if there are any.

CacheHealth.description: An indication of Cache health. Gives more information about health than just that related to provisioning.

CacheUpgradeStatus.description: Properties describing the software upgrade state of the Cache.

currentFirmwareVersion.description: Version string of the firmware currently installed on this Cache.

firmwareUpdateStatus.description: True if there is a firmware update ready to install on this Cache. The firmware will automatically be installed after firmwareUpdateDeadline if not triggered earlier via the upgrade operation.

firmwareUpdateDeadline.description: Time at which the pending firmware update will automatically be installed on the Cache.

lastFirmwareUpdate.description: Time of the last successful firmware update.

pendingFirmwareVersion.description: When firmwareUpdateAvailable is true, this field holds the version string for the update.

UnknownProperties.description: Properties of an unknown type of Storage Target.

id.description: Resource ID of the Storage Target.

junctions.description: List of Cache namespace junctions to target for namespace associations.

Nfs3TargetProperties.description: An NFSv3 mount point for use as a Storage Target.

target.description: IP address or host name of an NFSv3 host (e.g., 10.0.44.44).

usageModel.description: Identifies the primary usage model to be used for this Storage Target. Get choices from .../usageModels

ClfsTargetProperties.description: Storage container for use as a CLFS Storage Target.

UnknownTargetProperties.description: Storage container for use as an Unknown Storage Target.

unknownMap.description: Dictionary of string->string pairs containing information about the Storage Target.

ResourceName.description: Schema for the name of resources served by this provider. Note that objects will contain an odata @id annotation as appropriate. This will contain the complete URL of the object. These names are case-preserving, but not case sensitive.

resourceType.description: The type of resource the SKU applies to.

capabilities.description: A list of capabilities of this SKU, such as throughput or ops/sec.

locations.description: The set of locations that the SKU is available. This will be supported and registered Azure Geo Regions (e.g., West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.).

locationInfo.description: The set of locations that the SKU is available.

restrictions.description: The restrictions preventing this SKU from being used. This is empty if there are no restrictions.

type.description: The type of restrictions. In this version, the only possible value for this is location.

values.description: The value of restrictions. If the restriction type is set to location, then this would be the different locations where the SKU is restricted.

reasonCode.description: The reason for the restriction. As of now this can be "QuotaId" or "NotAvailableForSubscription". "QuotaId" is set when the SKU has requiredQuotas parameter as the subscription does not belong to that quota. "NotAvailableForSubscription" is related to capacity at the datacenter.

Restriction.description: The restrictions preventing this SKU from being used.

name.description: Name of a capability, such as ops/sec.

value.description: Quantity, if the capability is measured by quantity.

location.description: Location where this SKU is available.

ResourceSkusResult.description: The response from the List Cache SKUs operation.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of Cache SKUs.

value.description: The list of SKUs available for the subscription.

namespacePath.description: Namespace path on a Cache for a Storage Target.

targetPath.description: Path in Storage Target to which namespacePath points.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of Storage Targets.

value.description: The list of Storage Targets defined for the Cache.

display.description: Localized information describing this usage model.

description.description: String to display for this usage model.

modelName.description: Non-localized keyword name for this usage model.

targetType.description: The type of Storage Target to which this model is applicable (only nfs3 as of this version).

UsageModelsResult.description: A list of Cache usage models.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of Cache usage models.

value.description: The list of usage models available for the subscription.

amlFilesystem.description: An amlFilesystem instance. Follows Azure Resource Manager standards: https://github.com/Azure/azure-resource-manager-rpc/blob/master/v1.0/resource-api-reference.md

identity.description: The managed identity used by the amlFilesystem, if configured.

storageCapacityTiB.description: The size of this filesystem, in TiB.  This may be rounded up.

encryptionSettings.description: Specifies encryption settings of the amlFilesystem.

maintenanceWindow.description: Start time of a 30 minute weekly maintenance window

hsmSettings.description: Specifies HSM settings of the amlFilesystem.

amlFilesystemsListResult.description: Result of the request to list Caches. It contains a list of Caches and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of Cache list results, if there are any.

principalId.description: The principal id of the amlFilesystem.

tenantId.description: The tenant id associated with the amlFilesystem.

type.description: The type of identity used for the amlFilesystem

amlFilesystemMaintenanceStatus.description: Properties describing the software upgrade state of the amlFilesystem.

currentFirmwareVersion.description: Version string of the firmware currently installed on this amlFilesystem.

firmwareUpdateStatus.description: True if there is a firmware update ready to install on this amlFilesystem. The firmware will automatically be installed after firmwareUpdateDeadline if not triggered earlier via the upgrade operation.

firmwareUpdateDeadline.description: Time at which the pending firmware update will automatically be installed on the amlFilesystem.

lastFirmwareUpdate.description: Time of the last successful firmware update.

pendingFirmwareVersion.description: When firmwareUpdateAvailable is true, this field holds the version string for the update.

amlFilesystemHealth.description: An indication of amlFilesystem health. Gives more information about health than just that related to provisioning.

keyEncryptionKey.description: Specifies the location of the encryption key in Key Vault.

containerKeyVaultKey.description: Specifies the location of the encryption key in Key Vault.

importPrefix.description: Path/Prefix for blobs in above container.  Only blobs containing this prefix get pre-hydrated into the cluster namespace

exportPrefix.description: Path/Prefix in above blob container where data gets exported when an archive task runs

amlFilesystemHydrationStatus.description: Information about the amlFilesystem hydration status

state.description: The state of the namespace hydration

progress.description: Progress information for the namespace hydration

filesystemPath.description: The path to the filesystem to archive.

state.description: The state of the archive operation

lastCompletionTime.description: The time of the last completed archive operation

percentComplete.description: The completion percentage of the archive

errorCode.description: The error code of the archive operation

errorMessage.description: The error message of the archive operation

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
